scenarios.title: 1. Single VPC
scenarios.description: Simplest cloud network with one public subnet.

scenarios.title: 2. Multi-tier VPC
scenarios.description: Professional VPC with public/private segmentation.

scenarios.title: 3. Secure Database Tier
scenarios.description: Isolation of sensitive data between web DMZ and secure backend.

scenarios.title: 4. Public Load Balancer & Private Backend
scenarios.description: Ingress traffic management with a public listener and private workers.

scenarios.title: 5. NAT Router for Private Subnets
scenarios.description: Controlled internet access for isolated instances.

scenarios.title: 6. Secure Microservices Mesh
scenarios.description: Secure service-to-service communication.

scenarios.title: 7. Managed VPN
scenarios.description: Secure cloud-to-on-prem or region-to-region connectivity.

scenarios.title: 8. Private Mesh Overlay
scenarios.description: Zero-trust mesh overlay networking.

scenarios.title: 9. VPC Peering
scenarios.description: Simple VPC-to-VPC connectivity within the same region.

scenarios.title: 10. Private Service Connectivity
scenarios.description: Private service connectivity without full network peering.

scenarios.title: 11. Collaborative Shared Network
scenarios.description: Centralized network management with departmental isolation.

scenarios.title: 12. Kubernetes Hybrid Network
scenarios.description: Complex enterprise connectivity with secondary addressing.

scenarios.title: 13. Secure Application Service Mesh
scenarios.description: High-level application-layer mesh across multiple tiers.

scenarios.title: 14. Network Lifecycle: Automated vs Manual
scenarios.description: Contrast automated regional coverage with manual precision.

scenarios.title: 15. Policy Enforcement
scenarios.description: Demonstrate network restriction and security baseline enforcement.

scenarios.title: 16. Hybrid Connectivity: Dedicated & Redundant VPN
scenarios.description: High-speed dedicated cloud connectivity with encrypted fallback.

scenarios.title: 17. Enterprise Hub-and-Spoke
scenarios.description: Large-scale topology with central policy management.

scenarios.title: 18. Virtual Appliance Routing
scenarios.description: Route traffic through a security appliance in a hub VPC.

scenarios.title: 19. Hub Gateway Transit
scenarios.description: Spokes use a central hub's VPN gateway.

scenarios.title: 20. Data-Scale Network: Secondary CIDR Expansion & Pre-initialized Instances
scenarios.description: High-density networking with secondary CIDR ranges to provide ready-state instance pools

scenarios.title: 21. Subnet-Level Peering
scenarios.description: Restrict peering connectivity to specific subnets.

scenarios.title: 22. Shared Cluster Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Shared VPC for multiple teams with governance.

scenarios.title: 23. Cloud-Native Service Hub
scenarios.description: Identity-based service connectivity layer.

scenarios.title: 24. Hybrid Appliance Bridge
scenarios.description: Managed cloud VPN connecting to a custom software appliance.

scenarios.title: 25. AI Infrastructure: Accelerated RDMA Network
scenarios.description: Specialized high-performance networking for AI/ML training workloads

scenarios.title: 26. Global Transit: Multi-Region Hubs with GRE Support
scenarios.description: Integration of SASE and SD-WAN using GRE tunneling over global transit hubs

scenarios.title: 27. Dual-Stack Infrastructure: IPv4 & IPv6 Coexistence
scenarios.description: Modern network design supporting concurrent IPv4 and IPv6 traffic flows

scenarios.title: 28. Cloud Native NAT Router
scenarios.description: Linux-based NAT router managing ingress and egress.

scenarios.title: 29. Heterogeneous Load Balancing
scenarios.description: Load Balancer distributing traffic across mixed-os backends.

scenarios.title: 30. Standard IPsec VPN (Site-to-Site)
scenarios.description: Secure IPsec tunnel between a VPC and on-prem.

scenarios.title: 31. Remote Access VPN
scenarios.description: Road Warrior connectivity via IKEv2/IPsec.

scenarios.title: 32. Private DNS Discovery
scenarios.description: Internal zone management with private resolution.

scenarios.title: 33. Legacy Windows Integration
scenarios.description: Legacy workloads with multiple interfaces.

scenarios.title: 34. Brownfield Endpoint Adoption
scenarios.description: Adopt existing workloads into a new VPC without redeployment, ensuring accurate VPC View mapping.

scenarios.title: 35. Partial Brownfield Adoption
scenarios.description: Adopt a subset of existing workloads while rejecting conflicting endpoints, with VPC View reflecting accurate endpoint placement.

scenarios.title: 36. Brownfield Adoption Under Churn
scenarios.description: Adopt existing workloads into a new VPC while maintaining accurate VPC View display during control plane churn.
